results.name: The absolute direction (0=east, 1=south, 2=west, 3=north) taken by the type I Hilbert's Hamiltonian walk A163359 at the step n.
comment: Taking every sixteenth term gives the same sequence: (and similarly for all higher powers of 16 as well): a(n) = a(16*n).
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4096
mathematica: a[1] = L[0]; Map[(a[n_ /; IntegerQ[(n - #)/16]] := Part[Flatten[a[(n + 16 - #)/16/.HC/.HC],#]) &, Range[16]];
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 01 2009
